statements: SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Weapons';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, item_name, item_category FROM game_inventory ORDER BY item_category ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM game_inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Armor' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM game_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Armor' ORDER BY item_name
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM game_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Weapon' AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_description ASC
SELECT id, item_name, item_description FROM game_inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM game_inventory
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM game_inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 0
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Weapon'
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Armor' ORDER BY item_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Armor';
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM game_inventory ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;
SELECT shop_id, item_name, item_price FROM item_information JOIN game_inventory ON item_information.item_id = game_inventory.item_id;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 10 AND item_type = 'Consumable' ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT item_id, item_name, SUM(item_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM game_inventory GROUP BY item_id, item_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC, price DESC, quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT * FROM shops WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT category_name FROM item_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory INNER JOIN shops ON inventory.item_id = shops.shop_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 AND item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM shops WHERE location = 'California');
SELECT item_name, category_name FROM inventory JOIN item_categories ON inventory.item_id = item_categories.category_id WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM inventory JOIN item_categories ON inventory.item_id = item_categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT shop_name, location, total_items FROM shop_inventory ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM item_categories WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, property_name, property_value FROM item_properties WHERE property_name LIKE '%color%';
SELECT * FROM game_inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT shop_name, location, total_items FROM shop_inventory WHERE total_items < 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT item_name, property_value FROM game_inventory JOIN item_properties ON game_inventory.id = item_properties.id WHERE property_name = 'Color' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%sword%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM shop_inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_description FROM game_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT shop_id, item_id, quantity, price FROM shop_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_type, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 GROUP BY item_type;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(item_id) > 5;
SELECT item_name, price FROM shop_inventory WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5, 10;
SELECT shop_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM shop_inventory GROUP BY shop_id HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
